009package imagingbook.violajones.lib;
010
011import java.util.LinkedList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import imagingbook.common.image.IntegralImage;
015
016/**
017 * A single stage of the cascade. Each stage consists of several trees and a
018 * threshold. When using the detector on a window, each tree returns a value. If
019 * the sum of these values exceeds the threshold, the stage succeeds, else it
020 * fails (and the window is not the object looked for).
021 */
022public class Stage {
023        
024        private final double threshold;
025        private final List<FeatureTree> trees;
026
027        public Stage(double threshold) {
028                this.threshold = threshold;
029                trees = new LinkedList<FeatureTree>();
030        }
031
032        public void addTree(FeatureTree t) {
033                trees.add(t);
034        }
035        
036        public List<FeatureTree> getTrees() {
037                return trees;
038        }
039        
040        public double getThreshold() {
041                return threshold;
042        }
043        
044        // Sum up the values returned by each tree of this stage.
045        protected double sum(IntegralImage II, int u, int v, double scale) {
046                double sum = 0;
047                for (FeatureTree tree : trees) {
048                        sum = sum + tree.eval(II, u, v, scale);
049                }
050                return sum;
051        }
052        
053        // Stage succeeds only if the sum exceeds the stage threshold.
054        protected boolean pass(IntegralImage II, int u, int v, double scale) {
055                return sum(II, u, v, scale) > threshold;
056        }
057        
058
059        public void print() {
060                System.out.format("   threshold = %.4f\n", threshold);
061                int treeCnt = 0;
062                for (FeatureTree tree : trees) {
063                        System.out.format("   tree = %d\n", treeCnt);
064                        tree.print();
065                        treeCnt++;
066                }
067        }
068
069}
